properties.areaDesc: Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Northwest Blue Mountains
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 4 at 3:43AM PST until February 5 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton OR
properties.description:
...WINTER STORM TO IMPACT THE REGION TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH
WEDNESDAY EVENING...

.A storm system will move into the region Tuesday afternoon.
Abundant moisture will result in heavy amounts of snow for the
mountains and high valleys before snow levels rise and
precipitation changes to rain.

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 16
inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...In Washington, Northwest Blue Mountains. In Oregon,
Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Blowing
and drifting snow possible.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY
